channel.title: Projects on Alan
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Alan

item.title: Project 1
item.description: This project requires data from two separate data sets. Information about these the first dataset for Wages, Experience, and Schooling can be found here: https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/doc/Ecdat/Wages1.html Information about the second dataset for Salies for Professors can be found here: https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/doc/carData/Salaries.html To download the csv files directly, please click these links: https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/csv/Ecdat/Wages1.csv https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/csv/carData/Salaries.csv Introduction The two data sets being analyzed in this project (links to the data sets official pages can be found above) are the Wages, Experience and Schooling data set and the Salaries for Professors data set.

item.title: Project2
item.description: Project 2: Modeling, Testing, and Predicting Introduction The data set being analyzed in this project is the KosteckiDillon data set from the carData package. The data set consists of logs from 133 patients from a treatment program that aimed to reduce migraine frequency and severity. This data set contains the variables time, dos, hatype, age, airq, medication, headache, and sex. Time represents the time in days relative to the onset of treatment, which occurred at time zero.
